lines: Thakame ya Jesũ, Nĩĩtheretie meehia biũ;
No nĩguo there biũ, No nginya ndike kuo biũ.
Ndike biũ, rũũĩ-inĩ, Rũa thakame theru biũ,
Ndike thakame-inĩ Thakame ya goro ki.
O mũthenya, O thaa Nyonaga iraathimo;
Ngoro-inĩ gwĩ thaayũ, Ndĩ thĩ ĩno ya meehia;
No ndiaga kũhooya, Kinya there thĩinĩ biũ.
